name: stick Warriors: Legends Hero
description:
Stick Warriors: Legend Hero the newest smash hit game comes to mobile.
The game is an arena where deadly battles are conducted between popular Stickman characters. Show you warrior skills to become a winner. Through each level, your enemies will upgrade their power, which makes the game stay challenging and exciting, and also not easy to win.
FEATURE:
• Easy to play the game and Easy to control.
• Graphics and Soundtrack addictive
• A lot of levels with different enemies
• Many Stickman characters to collect and upgrade.
HOW TO PLAY:
• Using booster heath, strength, destroy your Stickman enemies
• Control simple move, you just need to dodge, jump, power your skills direction
Take up the sword and show what you a warriors capacity!
Download for free and start have fun right now!


Download "Stick Warriors: Legend Hero" for free and share your relaxing moment with friends now!
